verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Alleluia!Alleluia!Alleluia!
The strife is o'er, the battle done
The victory of life is won
The song of triumph has begun
Alleluia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The power of death have done
Their worst
But Christ their legions hath
Dispersed
Let shouts of holy joy outburst
Alleluia!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The three sad days have quickly
Sped
He rises glorious from the dead
All glory to our risen Head
Alleluia!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He brake the age bound chains
Of hell
The bars from heaven's high
Portals fell
Let hymns of Praise
His triumph tell
Alleluia!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lord, by the stripes which
Wounded Thee
From death's dread sting
Thy servants free
That we may live and sing to Thee
Alleluia!
